text: The FPS Personnel and Organisation (, , ), also referred to as the FPS P&O;, was a Federal Public Service of Belgium. It was created by Royal Order on May 11, 2001, as part of the plans of the Verhofstadt I Government to modernise the federal administration. It is a so-called horizontal Federal Public Service because it isn't responsible for a specific policy field, but provides services to the other Federal Public Services. It merged into the Federal Public Service Policy and Support on 1 March 2017. Personnel and Organisation Category:Ministries established in 2001 Category:2001 establishments in Belgium
title: Federal Public Service Personnel and Organisation
